heroinfo: Hi, I’m Burcu. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences. Let’s shake hands with me.
js: JavaScript, often abbreviated as JS, is a programming language and core technology of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.
react: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components.
node: Node.js is a cross-platform, open-source JavaScript runtime environment that can run on Windows, Linux, Unix, macOS, and more.
aboutmeinfo: My passion for turning ideas into user-focused solutions has led me to be adaptable. I’m driven by the challenge of crafting intuitive web interfaces.
aboutmeinfo2: I'm energized by problem-solving and collaborating with teams to build products that exceed user expectations. I'm excited to apply my skills and insights in a dynamic development environment.
